faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here you will find answers to the most popular questions about our casino
faq.noAnswer: Didn't find an answer to your question?
faq.supportDescription: Our support service works 24/7 and is ready to help you

createAccount.question: How to create a casino account?
createAccount.answer: To create an account, click the "Register" button in the top right corner of the site. Fill in all required fields: email, password, first and last name. Then confirm your email address by clicking the link in the email.

deposit.question: How to deposit funds?
deposit.answer: You can deposit funds in several ways: bank card (Visa/Mastercard), electronic wallets (Qiwi, WebMoney, YuMoney), bank transfer or cryptocurrency. The minimum deposit amount is 100 rubles.

withdraw.question: How to withdraw winnings?
withdraw.answer: To withdraw funds, go to the "Cashier" section and select "Withdraw funds". Specify the amount and withdrawal method. Processing takes from a few minutes to 24 hours depending on the withdrawal method.

games.question: What games are available in the casino?
games.answer: Our casino offers: slots from leading providers, table games (roulette, blackjack, poker), live casino with real dealers, sports betting and exclusive games.

welcomeBonus.question: How to get welcome bonus?
welcomeBonus.answer: Welcome bonus is credited automatically after the first deposit of 1000 rubles or more. The bonus is 100% of the deposit amount + 100 free spins in Book of Ra slot.

wagering.question: What is wagering?
wagering.answer: Wagering is a condition that must be met to withdraw bonus funds. For example, if wagering is x35, you need to bet an amount 35 times larger than the received bonus.

security.question: Is it safe to play in your casino?
security.answer: Yes, our casino is licensed and uses modern SSL encryption technologies to protect your data. All games are certified and use a random number generator.

resetPassword.question: How to reset password?
resetPassword.answer: Click "Forgot password?" on the login page, enter your email. You will receive an email with password reset instructions.

mobile.question: Can I play from a mobile device?
mobile.answer: Yes, our site is fully adapted for mobile devices. There is also a mobile app available for iOS and Android.

withdrawLimits.question: What are the withdrawal limits?
withdrawLimits.answer: Minimum withdrawal amount is 300 rubles. Maximum amount depends on VIP status: regular players - 100,000 rub/day, VIP players - no limits.

about.title: About Us
about.heroDescription: We create the best gaming experience by combining modern technology with classic casino games
about.description: Our casino is a modern gaming platform that offers a wide selection of gambling games and entertainment. We strive to provide a safe, fair and exciting gaming environment for all our users.
about.experience: With years of experience in the gambling industry, we understand player needs and constantly improve our services. Our team of professionals works to ensure every player has an unforgettable experience.
about.missionText: To provide players with a safe, fair and exciting gaming environment with the best games and first-class customer service.
about.visionText: To become the leading gaming platform that sets standards for quality and innovation in the online casino industry.
about.securityText: We use modern encryption and data protection technologies to ensure the security of your funds and personal information.
about.performanceText: Our platform works fast and stable, providing smooth gameplay without delays and failures.
about.designText: Modern and intuitive interface adapted for all devices — from mobile to desktop computers.
about.ceoDescription: Experienced leader with 15 years of experience in gambling and technology industry.
about.ctoDescription: Expert in developing gaming platforms and security systems.
about.leadDeveloperDescription: Frontend and backend development specialist with focus on user experience.
